mapper.select:
select merchant_id, merchant_name, promotion_count, sell_count from `merchant`
where merchant_name like '%' #{merchantName} '%'

select `merchant`.*, `merchant_member`.merchant_member_id, `merchant_member`.merchant_member_name from `merchant` left join `merchant_member` on `merchant`.merchant_member_id = `merchant_member`.merchant_member_id where `merchant`.merchant_id = #{merchantId}
mapper.insert: insert into `merchant` ( merchant_name, merchant_image, merchant_member_id, create_user_id, create_time ) values ( #{merchantName}, #{merchantImage}, #{merchantMemberId}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update:

merchant_name = #{merchantName},
merchant_image = #{merchantImage},
merchant_member_id = #{merchantMemberId},
promotion_count = #{promotionCount},
sell_count = #{sellCount},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId},
update_time = #{updateTime}
where merchant_id = #{merchantId}
